title: What Happened to the Pink IGN Up at Noon Shirt?
description:
Batman -- Roger Craig Smith -- gave IGN Up at Noon host Greg Miller a little girl's shirt. Roger thought it was a joke. Greg actually got it on... but how did he get it off? Find out.

Watch Greg get the shirt: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jz8zjiNiO5s&feature=c4-overview-vl&list=PL54DA5E32466C49D8

Watch Greg put the shirt on: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqYRcvfJzSM&list=PL54DA5E32466C49D8&index=3

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: [ Applause] Up at Noon every Monday on IGN
